name: firebase-jest-testing
description: Tools for testing Firebase back-end features, using Jest.
author: <akauppi@gmail.com>

exports: CommonJS require doesn't check exports, so there's no point having the 'cjs' folder there.
engines.npm: >= 7.7.0 because of this (only matters for 'npm publish') -> https://github.com/npm/cli/issues/2834

peerDependencies: Force the downstream project to explicitly depend on these. It would be wrong that we bring the major libs in.

firebase-admin: Seen as an implementation detail - thus in 'dependencies' and not in 'peerDependencies'. The idea is that the
application project would not need to use 'firebase-admin' directly (and therefore would not care about its very existence).
